title: Visual Studio 2022
description: Installs Visual Studio 2022. If Community edition, no need for a product key. If no key is provided, the product provides a 30 day trial.  You can switch from trial to licensed at any time using your product key or by entering your VS account credentials.

Edition.description: Visual Studio Edition (Enterprise, Professional or Community)

Preview.description: Install latest release or preview version

Workloads.description:
Comma separated list of workloads. See Reference

Use symbols to include additional components:
[+] include recommended, [*] include optional, [+*] include all components

ex: Azure+,NetWeb*,Data+*

NetWeb
ASP.NET and web development
Azure
Azure development
Data
Data storage and processing
DataScience
Data science and analytical applications
ManagedDesktop
.NET desktop development
ManagedGame
Game development with Unity
NativeCrossPlat
Linux development with C++
NativeDesktop
Desktop development with C++
NativeGame
Game development with C++
NativeMobile
Mobile development with C++
NetCoreTools
.NET cross-platform development (2017 and 2019 only)
NetCrossPlat
Mobile development with .NET
Node
Node.js development
Office
Office/SharePoint development
Python
Python development
Universal
Universal Windows Platform development
VisualStudioExtension
Visual Studio extension development
WebCrossPlat
Mobile development with JavaScript (VS2017 only)

Languages.description: You can specify multiple languages using a comma-separated list (,). Available values are here

Key.description: Visual Studio key in the format aaaaa-bbbbb-ccccc-ddddd-eeeee. Leave empty for 30 day trial.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powerShell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass " & ''.\vs2022.ps1'' -Edition ', parameters('Edition'), ' -VsVersion ', parameters('VsVersion'), ' -Preview ', parameters('Preview'),     ' -Workloads ''' , parameters('Workloads')  , ''' -Languages ''' , parameters('Languages')  , '''  -Key ''', parameters('Key'), ''' "'  )]
